Title: Investment Strategy
par1: At Stratosphere we are looking to own the highest quality businesses available with consistently growing cash flows
par2: There are several factors in what makes a great business to own for the long-term. We must be able to prove that the company has the following characteristics:
desc3: Recognizable moat that is durable and we suspect will be intact for a long time.
desc4: Has pricing power. Not commoditized product or service.
desc5: Demonstrates consistently high returns on invested capital.
desc6: Management aligned with long term performance and execution.
boxPar: An engineer by trade, Braden began building quant models for publicly traded stocks in engineering school. Stratosphere Investing was originally his blog and passion project to share investing ideas, models and equity research. Through the years, he found there was no reliable low-cost software powered analytics and research platform for managing his own investment portfolio.
